item.description:
The Wayland Sustainability home is a demonstration and educational project full of interesting sustainable materials, fun design / technology & healthy living / energy & money savings and water saving strategies and renewable technologies.

Here's a flier.

Please note that this is a guided tour, so it is important to be on time.

Given the short notice on the $5 Tour fee, I won't ask for (but will accept) the usual $1 Group Support donation.

Cheers,
Joshua Dobbelaar
Organizer, Boston Area Alternative Energy Supporters Meetup
JDobbelaar@Yahoo.com
617-680-2390
item.name: March Alt Energy Meetup - Wayland Sustainability House Tour
